user_question: Can you tell me about the history of the Basque language and generate an image of traditional Basque symbols?
final_answer: The Basque language, or Euskara, is a language isolate spoken by the Basque people in the Basque Country, straddling the border between Spain and France. It is one of the oldest languages in Europe, with no known linguistic relatives. Image of traditional Basque symbols generated. Unique features include its ergative-absolutive grammar, extensive use of suffixes, and a rich system of verb conjugation.
